description:
Become a brave girl tasked with rescuing her friends from an insidious witch. On your way you'll encounter spiders, witches and other dark spirits. This 2D platform game will also challenge you with poisonous mushrooms, deep voids filled with spikes and moving platforms that will test your skills.
Immerse yourself in a mysterious fairy tale world with a unique graphic style, handmade animations and compelling sound design.
name: Moonlight
